Item.Description:
Canon EOS Digital Rebel XT / 350D 8.0 MP Digital SLR Camera - Black

Description:  You are bidding on a Canon EOS Digital Rebel XT / 350D 8.0 MP Digital SLR Camera - Black.  This camera is in excellent preowned condition.  Comes with all pictured and in the original box.  Get at a GREAT price with FREE shipping!!  Please view ALL pictures carefully as the item pictured will be the item you receive. Please ask any questions you may have before the end of the auction. I will do the best to answer them to the best of my ability. Thank You & Good Luck! SERIOUS BUYERS ONLY PLEASE!! REASONABLE OFFERS CONSIDERED!! Thank You!! 

Payment is due immediately!  If your not going to pay do NOT buy it!  It will be relisted in 24 hours if I do not receive payment! (I do not tolerate non paying bidders!)

I ONLY ACCEPT RETURNS IF MY DESCRIPTION IS NOT CORRECT! OR I HAVE MISSED AN IMPORTANT CONDITION ISSUE! SORRY NO BUY AND TRY! (Recently I have had a lot of buyers buying and trying the item and if its not what they want, they want to return for a full refund! This is too difficult and not fair for the seller, to return items even when the description is totally accurate!)

Also if you do NOT intend to pay please do NOT make an offer or bid on an auction! Payment is due within 24 hours unless other arrangements have been made PRIOR to end of auction! I will report any non paying bidders to ebay. Again, not fair to the seller!! 

Note: I own a second hand store where I sell jewelry, antiques, and lots of miscellaneous items. All items I list on ebay are also in my shop! At any time these items could sell in the store and be pulled down from ebay. Please do NOT wait to make an offer as the item could be gone! Thanks!

SORRY NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!! (Unfortunately I have had too many bad experiences with international shipping and I can no longer offer it). 

The "Business Portion": I accept paypal. Payment is due within 24 hours. Items may only be returned if I have miss an important condition issue. This must be approved within 24 hours of receipt (refund amount will be less shipping and purchaser agrees to pay for shipping back.

Shop with confidence. I love what I do and take pride in delivering top notch personalized service. Your satisfaction from start to finish really is important to me! I know you have a choice when you shop on eBay and thank you for considering my items! Please contact me with any questions, I promise a quick response!

ALL SALES FINAL unless otherwise stated in the auction description. Most items I sell on ebay are purchased at my shop. I will try to describe all items to the best of my ability. If you have any questions please ask before the end of the auction. I will do my best to answer all questions.

SHIPPING: I ship priority or first class with insurance! If you would like your items shipped another way please contact me before the auction ends!

THANK YOU AND GOOD LUCK BIDDING!!
